title: Sanada Taiheiki
description: Yukimura, the greatest soldier in Japan, Masayuki, the man of the two sides, and Nobuyuki, the wily general who continued the Sanada bloodline until the Meiji era... "Sanada Taiheiki," a masterpiece of historical romance written by Shotaro Ikenami, depicting the fierce lives of the Sanada clan, has already been published in book form!ã€€
author: Ikenami Shoutarou
